==Football==
==Football==

[[Image:Ecuador football association.png|thumb|right|110px|[[Ecuador national football team]]]]
 
{{Main|Football in Ecuador}}
{{Main|Football in Ecuador}}
[[Association football|Football]] is the most popular sport in Ecuador. Its best known professional teams include: [[Barcelona Sporting Club|Barcelona]] and [[Club Sport Emelec|Emelec]] from [[Guayaquil]], [[Liga Deportiva Universitaria de Quito|LDU Quito]], [[Sociedad Deportivo Quito|Deportivo Quito]], and [[Club Deportivo El Nacional|El Nacional]] from [[Quito]], [[Centro Deportivo Olmedo|Olmedo]] from [[Riobamba]], and [[Club Deportivo Cuenca|Deportivo Cuenca]] from [[Cuenca, Ecuador|Cuenca]].
[[Association football|Football]] is the most popular sport in Ecuador. Its best known professional teams include: [[Barcelona Sporting Club|Barcelona]] and [[Club Sport Emelec|Emelec]] from [[Guayaquil]], [[Liga Deportiva Universitaria de Quito|LDU Quito]], [[Sociedad Deportivo Quito|Deportivo Quito]], and [[Club Deportivo El Nacional|El Nacional]] from [[Quito]], [[Centro Deportivo Olmedo|Olmedo]] from [[Riobamba]], and [[Club Deportivo Cuenca|Deportivo Cuenca]] from [[Cuenca, Ecuador|Cuenca]].
